item.title: Finished
item.description: Thoughts, opinions, reviews, and summaries on things I’ve finished since August 2021. Books Fiction The Handmaid’s Tale, Margaret Atwood 08/04/21 There is more than one kind of freedom," said Aunt Lydia. “Freedom to and freedom from. In the days of anarchy, it was freedom to. Now you are being given freedom from. Don’t underrate it.” A very multifaceted novel full of symbolism and allusions that managed to somehow confuse, entertain, amaze me all at the same time.
